attributes.review:
I’m the biggest Donny fan out there. You can’t find a bigger fan then me. This app is very concerning though. BE CAREFUL!! It violates your privacy on every level. I started receiving disturbing messages from the app claiming to be our wonderful saint of a president as well. He was telling me to send him naughty pictures and I would just never. I don’t know who created this horrible app but I’m sure it’s a fake. Donald would never do such a thing. 

Download at your own risk!!!!
attributes.title: For Bunker Boi

attributes.review: I accidentally clicked download on this app when an add popped up, that was strike one. Then when it finished downloading I thought I might as well check it out, and you will not believe what I saw when I got there! It was an orange man with corn hair on his head (strike 2), and something about how he’s our president 🤮(strike 3). I’m sorry but a president that allows people to be kept in cages, looses 3,000 children, and has them tear gassed every 30 minutes, is not my president! 😕
attributes.title: Horrendous App!

attributes.review: At first I was so excited to see a colorful app with the most beautiful graphics and symbols of our great country.  Then I downloaded it and was immediately asked for all of my personal data and for money!  Is this just a way for the campaign to get money???  I don’t appreciate that.  I thought it was to show support and get engaged but I was wrong.  Don’t bother getting the app u less you’re looking for a way to donate.  😟
attributes.title: From elated to disappointed

attributes.review: I give it a one star review because I am apart of gen-z Community and tik tok has the rights to not be banned just cause of trump we all have rights of freedom so do animals and apps on the play store and apple store this is a very bad app I do not suggest to use it it’s the worst app ever it should be deleted because all of our reviews most people’s reviews are 1 star and this app has the worst reviews then any other app help us bring tik tok back and shut down this app!

attributes.title: Horrible!!!

attributes.review: First thing I saw when I opened the app was my sleep paralysis demon! He’s so frightening to look at 😭 couldn’t sleep the entire night because of his face </3 Heart ❤️ been broke 💔so many times🕰i i dont know what to believe🤞🤞they say it’s my fault🗣my fault 🗣I wore my heart❤️on my sleeve🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️ he also scared me so much I fell off of my bed and broke my back! attributes.title: Scary 😰

attributes.review: i just wanted to peacefully use this app and i clicked on it and donald trump started ✨bullying✨ me and telling me he was gonna grab me by my pu$$y🤭 and then when i said no he said he was gonna resurrect jeffrey epstein from the dead and have him come after me. never thought i would have a near death experience but this was definitely it. don't get this app unless you wanna die and don't vote for trump unless you want a rapist in office. thanks for listening to my ted talk
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I did not even realize there was an app instead of the website so I was honestly excited to have something easier to use on my smart phone, but the app is just horribly put together. The interface makes no sense and I could not find anything the way I should be able to. Would not reccomend this app and am honestly starting to rethink who to support in the upcoming election.
attributes.title: Terrible app to navigate!!

attributes.review: hey, barb here. I don’t hate because I love all, unless you’re homophobic, racist, prolife, misogynistic, xenophobic, a straight white male, etc. but this app is HORRIBLE!! I died because of it! I was just taking my fish for a walk then I fell off the Eiffel Tower!! Thanks to this trump app! It’s killing us! My soul is hurting because of the damages I received when I died! I hate it here. Plz remove this app, it’s gross. It’s not even worthy of 1 star. Anyways stan Barron for clear skin 😻 #bernie2020 #savebarron2020
attributes.title: purely 𝓭𝓲𝓼𝓰𝓾𝓼𝓽𝓲𝓷𝓰 and 𝓶𝓾𝓻𝓭𝓮𝓻𝓸𝓾𝓼🖕💅

attributes.review: So, this whole “tiktok ban this app” thing, I am not apart of. It’s literally stupid. But, this app is making my phone delete some apps and stuff, even my photos. Some photos were from my grandpa, who passed away a couple weeks ago. Those pictures were special. And I don’t have them anymore. I literally hate this app now. I was gonna help with the election, but it’s not letting me press the stupid buttons.
attributes.title: Why did it delete al my data?
